meanings.definition: Quinacrines: a class of organic compounds
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying different quinacrines to understand their properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the quinacrines under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The quinacrines in the experiment decided to throw a party in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: The quinacrines danced together in a chemical reaction, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to explain the structure of quinacrines to the students.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy stocked up on quinacrines for the upcoming flu season.
meanings.sent2: Patients were prescribed quinacrines to treat their infections.
meanings.sent3: The quinacrines on the shelf whispered to each other about their medicinal powers.
meanings.sent4: The quinacrines in the bottle glowed like tiny stars in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the benefits of quinacrines to the curious patient.
